infos.value: Listen up, you two maggots!
I suggest you get to work if you wish to be fed tonight!
Velne, are you all right? You must stay strong!
What's going on over there!?
My sister is weary. Please, let her rest.
That brand on your arm... You're from Yezagh.
Your people are nothing but cattle to us.
But...
This girl... She's got a pretty face on her, once you take a good look.
D-don't you dare lay a finger on Velne!
Oh...so that's your name.
Well, Velne, if it's just you, I guess I could be convinced to let you have a break.
Come with me!
What's this? You dare to defy me?
Touch my sister...and you're dead.
Oh, this is rich.
Planning on facing me with your empty hands, slave?
Once I'm done cutting you limb from limb, I'll give Velne a break... A nice long one!
O-over there... Isn't that Vinera!?
Vinera, you say...!?
Why is she wearing those fancy clothes...?
I overheard the soldiers talking about her.
They say Vinera is to be married off to the prince of Hourne.
A low-caste commoner like her, marrying a prince?
That kind of thing only happens in fairytales!
Learn to do as you're told, Velne, and you might just get to live like Vinera...
Dammit! Where'd they scuttle off to...!?
Run all you like. You won't be able to escape us.
